item.title: Dark Chocolate
item.description: A story where an inquiry is ordered into a missing person case. The court grants the accused judicial custody till the end of the month and all of them are brought to the Police Station and thus begins their separate interrogation to find out the truth behind the gruesome murder. In a Rashomon effect we see the various versions of the same crime, along with flashbacks to the actual motive behind the killing by the three accused. Who all were to gain from her death? Was it just the family, or were there people in position of power involved? Can a mother really kill her own daughter? Watch to find out.

item.title: Meera ( A Bloody Love Story)
item.description: This is a tale about Meera; a highly admired business professional who faces an unprecedented event and is forced to do the most disgusting thing any human being can ever do. Will she realise her grave mistake? Watch to find out!
item.tags: Meera ( A Bloody Love Story), Movie, Full Movie, Thriller, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Vetapalem
item.description: Vetapalem is a 2016 Telugu crime thriller which discusses about the life of orphans. It sheds light on how they grow up and what are the situations faced by them over the course of their upbringing. How would the orphans cope with these circumstances? Watch to find out
item.tags: Vetapalem, Movie, Full Movie, Thriller, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Sivagami
item.description: The film is about a couple who movie to their ancestral bungalow in Vizag. As they settle in, an evil spirit enters the woman's body and starts creating havoc for the entire family. Who is this evil spirit and why did it target the couple? That forms the rest of the story.
item.tags: Sivagami, Movie, Full Movie, Thriller, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: 7 To 4
item.description: The Telugu film ‘7 to 4’ talks about a team comprising of youngsters, dealing with brats who sexually harass woman in Hyderabad during the wee-hours. The protagonists target suspects of sexual crimes and also those who are in the cop’s watch list. Left with no option but to curb the crime rate across the city, the ruthless cops ignore the law to punish these rapists. Who are those youngsters and why are they helping the cops?
item.tags: 7 To 4, Movie, Full Movie, Thriller, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Beiimaan Love
item.description: Beimaan Love is a tale about a young and ambitious woman's life which suddenly comes crashing down when she is betrayed in love. Determined to get revenge she reinvents herself as a successful businesswoman and avenges what she always wanted to.

item.title: Global Baba
item.description: Pehelwan, a criminal, escapes from a police encounter and disguises himself as a baba. He then uses his guise not only to amass followers but also to discreetly carry out his criminal activities.
item.producer: Vijay Bansal, Priya bansal, Harsh Vardhan Ojha
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Global Baba, Pankaj Tripathy,Ravi Kishan,Abhimanyu Singh, Sandeepa Dhar, Shemaroo Full Movies, Thriller

item.title: Buddha in a Traffic Jam
item.description: Vikram, a happy-go-lucky management student from a top Business School of India who becomes an overnight sensation after a successful internet campaign against the radical fundamentalism of moral policing in India. This prompts his university teacher, Professor Ranjan Batki, to throw him a challenge for yet another internet campaign. A campaign that would help raise money via a non-profit Pottery Club for the poor people living in Maoists areas of India. Little did Vikram know that he was about to become a part of a plot that would put his life and the nation at risk. He gets entangled between two corrupt facets - Socialism and Capitalism, both of which are deeply rooted in India.
item.tags: Film,Movie,Scenes,Buddha in a Traffic Jam,Entertainment

item.title: Kahaani 2
item.description: Vidya leads a peaceful life in a quiet little town with her daughter, Minnie. Their lives take a drastic turn when Minnie gets kidnapped, and Vidya meets with an accident that sends her into a coma.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Kahaani 2, Pen Movies

item.title: A Scandall
item.description: Kuhu, a 9 year old girl, drowns in a lake in Nainital. Soon after, her father, Manav falls off a cliff but lives on to lead a strange life of hallucinations and complete metamorphosis. Manav now sees his dead daughter. When Vidhu, a film school pass out, hears this story from his girlfriend Koya, he finds it interesting enough to turn it into a film. A small crew of four set out for Nainital, hoping to film paranormal activities going around Kuhu's family. Very little they know that their exploits will lead them into a quagmire of incest, sex and an unsolved murder mystery.

item.title: Fever
item.description: An assassin loses his memory in an accident. He wakes up knowing only his name, and a subconscious memory of a crime he has committed.
item.tags: Fever Trailer,Hindi,Bollywood,Movies,Trailers

item.title: One Night Stand
item.description: The story is about Urvil Raisingh and Celina who meet at an event and a memorable night later. Returning back home they continue with their lives. The memories of Celina haunt Urvil. What happens next forms the crux of the unfolding drama. One Night Stand explores the hypocritical world we live in. What is it that Urvil wants?
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, One Night Stand, Hi-5 Entertainments

item.title: Main Hoon Rakshak
item.description: Main Hoon Rakshak is the Hindi dubbed version of the Tamil Action Blockbuster ‘Paayum Puli’. The movie story deals with Jayaseelan, an undercover encounter specialist who is on a mission to eliminate a gang in Madurai who are extorting money from rich businessmen and later killing them. A senior officer who kills the gang leader Bhavani's brother is killed in front of the public and soon Jayaseelan shoots almost all the members of the gang. But who is the king- pin to the nefarious activities in the city?

item.title: Dark Places
item.description: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that tragic night.
item.producer: Stéphane Marsil, Azim Bolkiah, Matthew Rhodes, Cathy Schulman, Charlize Theron
item.tags: Dark,Places,Hollywood Movies,Latest English Movies,entertainment,english movies,Movie,Full Movies,Thriller,2015

item.title: Fattu Saala
item.description: The film is about a gangster's rise and fall in the world of crime. Fateh Khan, aka Fattu Bhai is a gangster, living in the slums of Mumbai, who is shot dead by his own friends.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Fattu Saala, KRS Entertainment, KRS Entertainment Movie

item.title: Charlie Kay Chakkar Mein
item.description: Charlie Ke Chakkar Mein is a story about four youngsters high on drugs, getting involved in an accident of a gangster. This pushes them into the underworld where the conspiracies are so complex that even the cops are unable to get a clue.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Charlie Kay Chakkar Mein, Naseeruddin Shah, Disha Arora, Shemaroo Full Movies, Thriller

item.title: 31st October - Full Movie
item.description: Viu 31st October, a story about the Prime Minister of India who gets assassinated by her Sikh Security Guards. Politicians use this incident to spark public hatred towards the Sikhs, labelling them as traitors. Devender Singh and his family are stuck in their house as their city plummets. In 24 hours of uncertain oscillations, helplessness and with their relatives dying, and neighbours turning hostile, Devender`s family seeks help from their Hindu friends who live across town. In their attempt in ferrying Devender's family to safety, Pal, Tilak and Yogesh must face their own demons first.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Drama, 31st October, Movie, Magical Film Productions, Action, Bollywood

item.title: Satyadev The Fearless Cop
item.description: Satyadev The Fearless Cop is the Hindi dubbed version of the famous South Blockbuster ‘Yennai Arindhaal’. The story revolves around the life of a young boy, Sathyadev, who takes a destined route when his father becomes an incidental casualty in a scene of crime. The I.P.S. route takes away from him, a loving wife-to-be and renders a child motherless. It also gives him a prominent enemy, Victor, who makes a comeback into his life as the perpetrator when he is attempting to solve a kidnap case. And like the narrative tells at that very moment - 'All hell breaks loose' and culminates in a riotous climax.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Satyadev The Fearless Cop, Goldmines Telefilms

item.title: Tamanchey
item.description: An aggressive and passionate love story of two criminals who escape from a police van and decide to rob a bank while take up a steep ride to quick money. But the law has other plans and is not looking to arrest but to eliminate them. Is penance possible for them or will they too be exterminated in another statistical encounter?

item.title: Chaarfutiya Chhokare
item.description: The plot revolves around Neha, who is an NRI returning to India in order to start a school in a village in north Bihar. Starting off optimistic and happy about her endeavour, she is unaware of the hardships and risks awaiting her in this small, serene village. She is pleased after meeting three boys Awadhesh, Hari and Gorakh but soon finds out that it is the beginning of a nightmare. Being hard-core criminals, these three boys become the centre of her activities. After seeing this, she vows to stop the criminal and sexual exploitation of the children in the village. Her meeting with Janaki – the mother of one of the boys, Awadhesh – helps her understand the deeply embedded political-criminal nexus that pervades the system. Neha is resolute to free the three of them from this world of crime.
item.actor: Lekh Tandon, Mukesh Tiwari, Harsh Mayar
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Chaarfutiya Chhokare, Lekh Tandon, Mukesh Tiwari, Harsh Mayar, Soha Ali Khan, Seema Biswas, Shemaroo Full Movies, Thriller

item.title: Zid
item.description: A journalist, who is still in love with his ex-girlfriend, becomes the obsession of his landlord's daughter.

item.title: Zila Ghaziabad
item.description: A story based in the city of Ghaziabad, where a gang war breaks between two rival groups led by Satbir Singh and Fauji. Thakur Pritam Singh, a corrupt police officer, is transferred to the city to handle the situation. He ends up playing mind games with the two warring gangs, pitting them against each other. Fauji joins hands with Chairman’s arch rival Rashid to kill Satbir. What unfolds is a story with the elements of suspicion, betrayal, greed and politics mixed together. Who will have the final laugh?
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Zila Ghaziabad, Hi-5 Entertainments

item.title: Ankur Aroras Murder Case
item.description: An infant loses his life due to a surgeon’s slackness during an operation. Based on a real-life incident, this film sensationalizes the know-hows of Romesh, a medical intern surgeon and his mentor, Dr. Asthana. Was the death an accident or was it a well-planned cold blooded murder. Will the doctors succeed in hiding their mistake or will the mother of the kid get justice?
